channel.title: Alejandro Sánchez Yalí - Programming, Mathematics, and Technology Blog
channel.description: Welcome to my blog, where I share my notes and insights on programming, mathematics, and technology. From machine learning to software development, I cover a wide range of topics related to computer science and beyond.

item.title: Exploring Machine and Human Learning: Principles and Processes
item.description: What allows us to learn as human beings? In general, we acquire much of our knowledge through our experience with objects and the world around us. This means that we learn from the information and data we gather about them, rather than relying on abstract mathematical definitions.
item.author: asanchezyali@gmail.com (Alejandro Sánchez Yalí)

item.title: Explorando el aprendizaje de máquinas y humanos: principios y procesos
item.description: ¿Qué es lo que nos permite aprender como seres humanos? En general, adquirimos gran parte de nuestros conocimientos a través de nuestra experiencia con los objetos y el mundo que nos rodea. Esto significa que aprendemos a partir de la información y los datos que recopilamos sobre ellos, en lugar de depender de definiciones matemáticas abstractas.
item.author: asanchezyali@gmail.com (Alejandro Sánchez Yalí)
